Testing

Write logic tests for all logic files.

Testing Tools

  • pytest for general testing

  • pytest-cov for code coverage

  • Django built in testing tool

  • pydantic for type checking and data validation

  • mutmut for mutation testing

  • django-check-seo although not a traditional “code quality testing tool”, there’s no point in having a website if our SEO sucks, so we should test for it!

Functional tests

Unit tests

A good unit test should:

  • focus on a single use-case at a time

  • have a minimal set of assertions per test

  • demonstrate every use case.

Rules of thumb is:

  • if it can happen, it should be covered
